text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump 
Only the most incompetent,  disgraceful person on the planet could have put on as disgraceful and a carnival barking side show to the extent you're currently achieving. Do the whole world a favor and die from COVID-19 please.
